frontmatter.title: Finding flows suspended by DLP
frontmatter.description: So you designed and implemented Data Loss Prevention policy in Power Automate. Now it's time to check if there was any impact on existing flows.

frontmatter.title: Custom connectors with DLP policy in Power Automate
frontmatter.description: Custom connectors are not yet supported for Power Platform DLP policies. Let's check how they are processed and how we could secure them.
